meanings.definition: A vitamin essential for the normal functioning of the nervous system and the formation of red blood cells.
meanings.sent1: Taking cobalamin supplements can help keep your nerves healthy.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend including cobalamin-rich foods like meat and dairy in your diet.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled cobalamin powder all over my kitchen counter!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a dose of cobalamin, spreading warmth and energy.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of cobalamin-rich foods reminds me of the importance of blood health.

meanings.definition: A type of cobalt-containing compound that is a coenzyme in various metabolic processes.
meanings.sent1: The body needs cobalamin to help with important chemical reactions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the role of cobalamin in energy production within cells.
meanings.sent3: The tiny robot in the movie was powered by cobalamin - such a creative idea!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like cobalamin, driving her through the toughest challenges.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of cobalamin as a coenzyme is crucial for our body's functions.
